class.name: PLMISecSSOCLogContentProvider
class.abstract: This interface allows to customize the content of the audit log on authentication events wihtin a c++ process.

method.name: onAuthenticationFailure
method.abstract: Writes to the authentication audit log when autentication failed.

method.name: onAuthenticationSuccess
method.abstract: Writes to the authentication audit log when autentication is successful.
